CustomField.description: Created as a part of Heller Data Migration 2021.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Detailed notes on all the estate contacts (including but not limited to, attorney information, executor/trustee/personal representative information, addresses, phone numbers & emails), as well as notes throughout the administration that are helpful to understanding the timeline (known delays, creditor periods, asset updates, etcâ€¦
CustomField.label: Estate Notes
